name: fix c style pointer
description: the pointer should never go with the base_type, it must go with the variable that gives the base_type
content:
/* ******************************************
* correcting incorrectly formatted c code
* *******************************************/
( type1_t*       var1_
, type2_t*       var3
, sometype3_t*   tcache_
, ok_type_t     *var
) /* some comment */
